events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Senior Software Engineer position and have stored it in our candidate database.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster, focusing on software developer roles.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's recruitment process.
The candidate has completed the initial screening call successfully, demonstrating relevant software engineering experience.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong interest in moving forward with the interview process.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the engineering team for May 7th at 10:00 AM UTC.
